item.title: How To Display The Contents Of A File In Random Order
item.dc:creator: @raindropsc raindropsc
item.description:
@raindropsc wrote:

I Found Out How To Work It, After I Posted It about 3 hours ago

Sep 10 2006, 11:18 AM Wappy you could have just used your random text/image snipet and inserted links. I've come across a few sites were they do that. [quote] Ok here is some code you can use for displaying random text, images, or links.... [/quote] //put this code on the page you wish to display the random text/image/link on.. [CODE] <? //random code $xfile = @file("random.txt"); $random_num = rand (0,count($xfile)-1); $udata = explode("::",$xfile[$random_num]); echo "$udata[1]
"; ?> [/code] //create a text file like random.txt and put in it something like this.... [code] ::mRADAR.com ::SurfWAP.com

[/code]
This is the snippet from your site, can’t you use it?


Found It On http://trap17.com/

Read full topic
